knimeNode.name: ChemSpider (deprecated)
knimeNode.shortDescription: DEPRECATED. NOT WORKING ANYMORE. Download molecular structures from ChemSpider.com.

fullDescription.intro: DEPRECATED. DOES NOT WORK ANYMORE DUE TO API CHANGE. Downloads MDL molfiles for molecular structures based on given InChIKey's.

ports.outPort: MDL molfiles for the given InChIKeys
